A paste made by mashing the fine, threadlike roots of a certain creeper vine, spider root renders a victim clumsy and maladroit. 

**Saving Throw** DC 28 Fortitude; **Onset 1** minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 3d6 poison damage and [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) 1 (1 minute); **Stage 2** 4d6 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 minute); **Stage 3** 6d6 poison damage and clumsy 3 (1 minute)
